title: "Animal Tea Party"
content:
Welcome to our whimsical world of the Animal Tea Party! üê∞üêªü¶ä

Our website is a place where you can escape reality and immerse yourself in a magical tea party with your favorite anthropomorphic animals. Whether you're a fan of Alice in Wonderland, Beatrix Potter, or just love cute and quirky characters, you'll find something to delight you here.

Explore our collection of stories, illustrations, and merchandise featuring our charming animal friends. Join us for a cup of tea and a biscuit as we journey through their whimsical world together. We hope you enjoy your stay at the Animal Tea Party! üçµüç™

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A whimsical tea party with anthropomorphic animals"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
